text:
This Guide will be an electron-style application for macOS Desktop. As soon as we have testers we should also deploy this application on Windows and Linux. The application should be:

- Minimal (simple wrapper round TiddlyWiki
- Include TiddlyManagment functionaility
- Include TiddyPresentation functionality
- Include TiddlyAssociation functionaility
- Include TiddlyIdentity functionaility

The application should be able to progressively enhance its capabilities, starting with simple story telling, while enabling the reader to SignUp and becaome an active member of the project (TiddlyAssociation) whose content is described in the TiddlyPresentation. Thsi implles teh following functionality:
title: Desktop Guide Specification

text: Hitchhikers are nomads and teachers. They are mentors, facilitators and interdisciplinary researchers. There job is to convene community around a [[Guide]].
title: Draft of 'Hitchhikers'
draft.title: Hitchhikers

text: Hitchhikers are nomads and teachers. They are mentors, facilitators and interdisciplinary researchers. There job is to convene community around a [Guide]().
title: Hitchhikers

text: Hitchhikers is an ecosystem. We use the term as a shorthand for HitchikersGalaxy. Our aim is to launch a social movement centred around new type of [[Guide]].
title: Hitchhikers Project Specification

text:
[[Hitchikers Guide to the Galaxy]] is an ecosystem. We use the concept **galaxy** here to emphasise that this is not a single platform or project, but organised from the start as an [[Ecosystem of Initiatives]], within which there are some highly focussed initial projects. 

The choice of these initial projects is critical to the success of the project, and in this document we outline these core components with an emphasis on practicality where we look to focus on the minimal  that are required to bootstrap the HumanCentred growth of the wider ecosystem of projects that we anticipate attracting to the Galaxy.

<<timeline-vertical filter:"[tag[Galaxy]]" date:"due" dateformat:"mmm DDth">>
title: HitchikersGalaxy

text: Get the application in the hand of the firs tusers to get feedback, and ensure it's subsequent design, functionaility and features are driven by user demand in agile iterative cycles.
title: Release Destop Guide
